name: Blindvania
description:
(Controls and instructions below)

Welcome to Blindvania!

You are blind.

But you can see things thanks to echolocation!

In Blindvania, you can:

- Get ambushed by spiders!

- Kill spiders!

- Eat yummy spiders!

- Starve!

- Get killed by spiders!

- Explore the smallest jungle on earth!

- And much more! (Use your imagination)

Game Design & Programming: Brixia & Mr.chip

Sound Design : Luca Massacra

N.B. Minecraft food UI is only used as a placeholder because this is a prototype and we had not time to change it!
How to play.  Playable with a keyboard or gamepad. Walk: Arrow keys / Dpad or Left thumbstick Jump: Spacebar / Gamepad A or Y Attack / Eat: Keyboard X / Gamepad X or B Echolocation: Keyboard Z / Gamepad triggers or bumpers
